name: Bullet Fantasy
description:
In this game Jam version you have to survive 20 waves of a boss.

Tell me in the comments if you were able to survive all 20 :D

(I was kinda lazy... the first 2 days nothing happend besides asking some friends if there had time to join my journey, some brain storming. after 2 days and nearly everyone said he probably is too busy or said he would feel bad that they couldnt do much so they rather do nothing... i started creating something ,this is the result.) not many hours went into this game, because i still have school, but i got more and more hooked into creating this game.

Controlls:
Mouse only to play (move to cursor, Left mouse button = Fire)

Settings:
H - toggle hitbox visualization
N - toggle audio
M - toggle Music

Credits:
WaveOfColours - Projectile textures
Ninjutik - Music (created in the last 2 hours <.< big respect that he helped me last minute)
ererbe - other stuff lol

Used Assets:
ColinLeung-NiloCat / UnityURPToonLitShaderExample
